Text: Hey, the '90s called, they want their AVIs back.

Don't like it, don't download it.

Not interested in emorage as feedback.

@Cubival Fuck you. A ton of people prefer AVIs--I have two DVD players that ONLY play AVIs. Every video I download that's not AVI gets converted. I'm sorry we don't all have the most recent entertainment setups so why don't you just take two seconds and find a different file type. AVIs aren't exactly common anymore... it won't take you long to find something else.

And @Scorpicore, thank you for the AVI. Some of us still appreciate it.

no problemo...

I myself prefer .avi extensions, since Im too lazy to burn things onto a dvd. I just link the PC with the tv and stereo.
